title: The Scottish historie of Iames the fourth, slaine at Flodden Entermixed with a pleasant comedie, presented by Oboram King of Fayeries: as it hath bene sundrie times publikely plaide. Written by Robert Greene, Maister of Arts.
author: Greene, Robert, 1558?-1592.
notes: Not historical; based on the first story of the third decade of: Cintio, Giraldi.  Ecatommiti.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
